meanings.definition: The condition of having an excess of cholesterol in the blood.
meanings.sent1: High cholestases can lead to heart problems.
meanings.sent2: Doctors check for cholestases levels in routine blood tests.
meanings.sent3: The cholestases in his blood were so high, even the cholesterol meter was surprised!
meanings.sent4: Her arteries were like rivers clogged with cholestases, slowing down the flow of life.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained that cholestases are like little cholesterol soldiers marching through your bloodstream.

meanings.definition: The accumulation of bile in the liver.
meanings.sent1: Severe cholestases can cause liver damage.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with cholestases after examining his liver.
meanings.sent3: The cholestases in the liver were so happy, they decided to throw a bile party!
meanings.sent4: Her liver felt like a balloon filled with cholestases, ready to burst at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The bile ducts were blocked by cholestases, causing discomfort and pain in the liver.
